name: places/ChIJSWyqG5tYwokRAbV12lolArQ
formattedAddress: 234 Central Park W, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 234 Central Park W, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
Did Dr. Kumra pay people to write glowing reviews!? She was by far the worst doctor I have ever gone to!  I'm 65 years old and I've seen a lot of doctors in my life. She lacked compassion and was very quick to throw PPI's and steroids at me. She offered no alternatives whatsoever. I found it astounding that she did not talk to me about my diet, lifestyle or anything else that may be contributing to acid reflux. She treated me like I was one size fits all, having no interest in me as an individual. I also found it startling that my vitals were never taken! However, it showed up on my report that they were. How incredibly irresponsible!
Put your running shoes on and run as fast as you can from her.

Fast forward, I am now being treated by a doctor who understands my needs and thinks outside the proverbial box. I'm feeling 85 percent better, without the PPI's or steroids!

She treated me like I was one size fits all, having no interest in me as an individual. I also found it startling that my vitals were never taken! However, it showed up on my report that they were. Put your running shoes on and run as fast as you can from her.

originalText.text: Was she having a bad day? No idea. So many great reviews which had me confused after the appt. Went in with my grandmother as her translator. As a Doctor, you know having to deal with people, having patience & zero attitude kind of make sense. Even caught an eye roll at one point. She even looked grossed out as my grandmother coughed up & cleared her throat. Uhm ENT? My grandmother is almost 80. Only difficult moment was her not being able to tolerate the endoscope, since she's allergic to certain anesthesia, and could not get it done. Otherwise there was no warrant for the bother the doctor displayed. Two stars is me being nice & there rarely was a wait time which is a plus.

originalText.text: This was my first visit to Dr. Kunra.  My appointment was on time.  She was efficient and friendly.  She called me afterwards to follow up.  I recommend her.

text.text: This was my first visit to Dr. Kunra.  My appointment was on time.  She was efficient and friendly.  She called me afterwards to follow up.  I recommend her.

originalText.text: Dr Kumra is the best doctor I have ever had.  She is really fantastic.  I didn't have to wait at all in the office. She was a wonderful listener.  She communicated her expertise clearly and gave great advice.

text.text: Dr Kumra is the best doctor I have ever had.  She is really fantastic.  I didn't have to wait at all in the office. She was a wonderful listener.  She communicated her expertise clearly and gave great advice.

originalText.text: I've been seeing Dr Kumra on and off for all my ENT issues for years.  She's always been amazing.  She really listens and cares.  Always address and questions and concerns.  I am confident in her knowledge and ability and absolutely trust her with my ENT health. Plus a great bedside manner. I will NOT go anywhere else :) Oh, and she's refereed me to other doctors for other issues and they've also been great. I'm still seeing the allergist she sent me to years ago. She's the best. I highly recommend her.
